articles.title: Why I Stopped Chasing 'Success' and Started Living Intentionally
articles.excerpt: For years, I climbed ladders I never questioned. I had the job title, the income, the approval—but I felt lost. It wasn't until I paused and asked myself what success truly meant that everything began to shift.
articles.author: Jordan Ellis

articles.title: What No One Tells You About Leaving a Job You Were 'Good At'
articles.excerpt: I was competent, praised, and promoted—but I wasn't happy. Walking away from something you're good at is terrifying, especially when people don't understand why. This is what I wish someone had told me before I made that leap.
